repnme.cdata!:
India - Industrial Development Bank of
            India Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project aims to assist IDBI in using
            its refinance mechanism to finance imported goods and
            services required to develop small- and medium-scale
            industrial enterprises in India, and to improve the
            performance and effectiveness of the SFCs serving this sector.
